name: UpgradeBeacon
description: UpgradeBeacon. This implementation combines the gas savings of having no function selectors found in 0age's implementation: https://github.com/dharma-eng/dharma-smart-wallet/blob/master/contracts/proxies/smart-wallet/UpgradeBeaconProxyV1.sol With the added niceties of a safety check that each implementation is a contract and an Upgrade event emitted each time the implementation is changed found in OpenZeppelin's implementation: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/master/contracts/proxy/beacon/BeaconProxy.sol.
